SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.util.par

Class ParSLConfig

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.util.par.ParSLConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
public class ParSLConfig extends Struct implements NativeResource
Immutable configuration for a streamlines context.

Layout


 struct parsl_config {
     float thickness;
     uint32_t flags();
     int u_mode();
     float curves_max_flatness;
     float streamlines_seed_spacing;
     parsl_viewport streamlines_seed_viewport;
     float miter_limit;
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • ParSLConfig

      public ParSLConfig(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a ParSLConfig instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
